## Bcp47.choose() function

Matches a list of desired [languages](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) to a list of available [languages](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)<!-- -->, return a list of matching languages ordered from best to worst.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function choose(desired: LanguageSpec[], available: LanguageSpec[], options?: ILanguageTagInitOptions & ILanguageChooserOptions): Result<LanguageTag[]>;
```

[LanguageSpec](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

An array of [language specifications](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) containing an ordered list of preferred languages.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

available


</td><td>

[LanguageSpec](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md)<!-- -->\[\]


</td><td>

An array of [language specifications](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagespec.md) containing an unordered list of available languages.


</td></tr>

options


</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ (optional) Parameters to control language tag conversion or comparison

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->\[\]&gt;

`Success` with an ordered list of matching [languages](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->, or `Failure` with details if an error occurs.
